00131 INT TNaIAnalysis::ProcessEvent(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00132 {
00133   printf("Running TNaIAnalysis (NaI + CsI run 5)...\n");
00134 
00135   if(gData->fGeFADCBanks.size() < 8)
00136   {
00137     printf("TNaIAnalysis::ProcessEvent : Could not find NaI Detector banks.\n");
00138     return SUCCESS;
00139   }
00140 
00141 
00142   // Get the banks
00143   TOctalFADCBankReader& bNaI_timing = gData->fGeFADCBanks.at(kNaITimingChannel);
00144   TOctalFADCBankReader& bNaI_energy = gData->fGeFADCBanks.at(kNaIEnergyChannel);
00145 
00146   TOctalFADCBankReader& bCsI_energy = gData->fGeFADCBanks.at(kCsIEnergyChannel);
00147   TOctalFADCBankReader& bCsI_timing = gData->fGeFADCBanks.at(kCsITimingChannel);
00148 
00149   // Get the vector of islands
00150   vector<TOctalFADCIsland>& vNaI_timing = bNaI_timing.GetIslandVector();
00151   vector<TOctalFADCIsland>& vNaI_energy = bNaI_energy.GetIslandVector();
00152 
00153   vector<TOctalFADCIsland>& vCsI_timing = bCsI_timing.GetIslandVector();
00154   vector<TOctalFADCIsland>& vCsI_energy = bCsI_energy.GetIslandVector();
00155 
00156 //std::cout << "timingNaIClockPeriod " << timingNaIClockPeriod << "timingCsIClockPeriod " << timingCsIClockPeriod << std::endl;
00157 //std::cout << "kNaITimingChannel " << kNaITimingChannel << " kNaIEnergyChannel " << kNaIEnergyChannel << std::endl;
00158 
00159  
00160  //loop all channels and fill hAmplitude and time and set pulse quality flags
00161   for(int i=0; i < vNaI_timing.size(); i++)
00162   {
00163     hXRayStats->Fill(1);
00164     if(vNaI_timing[i].GoodPulse(shapNaITimingChannel,timingNaIClockPeriod,levelGoodPulse))
00165     {
00166       hXRayAmplitude->Fill(vNaI_timing[i].GetMax(), kNaITimingChannel+1 );
00167       hXRayTime->Fill(vNaI_timing[i].GetTimeNs(),kNaITimingChannel+1 );
00168     }
00169     else{hXRayStats->Fill(5);hXRayAmplitudeMissed->Fill(vNaI_timing[i].GetMax(), kNaITimingChannel+1 );}
00170   }
00171 
00172 
00173   for(int i=0; i < vNaI_energy.size(); i++)
00174   {
00175     hXRayStats->Fill(2);
00176     if(vNaI_energy[i].GoodPulse(shapNaIEnergyChannel,energyNaIClockPeriod,levelGoodPulse))
00177     {
00178       hXRayAmplitude->Fill(vNaI_energy[i].GetMax(), kNaIEnergyChannel+1 );
00179      // hXRayAvAmplitude->Fill( vNaI_energy[i].GetAverageMax(nAverage), kNaIEnergyChannel+1 );
00180       //if(vNaI_energy[i].FitGauss(10, 10, shapNaIEnergyChannel, energyNaIClockPeriod, pedestalNaIEnergyChannel)) { hXRayFitAmplitude->Fill( vNaI_energy[i].GetMaxGauss(), kNaIEnergyChannel+1 ); }
00181       hXRayTime->Fill(vNaI_energy[i].GetTimeNs(),kNaIEnergyChannel+1 );
00182     }
00183     else{hXRayStats->Fill(6);hXRayAmplitudeMissed->Fill(vNaI_energy[i].GetMax(), kNaIEnergyChannel+1 );} 
00184   }
00185 
00186  
00187   for(int i=0; i < vCsI_timing.size(); i++)
00188   {
00189     hXRayStats->Fill(3);
00190     if(vCsI_timing[i].GoodPulse(shapCsITimingChannel,timingCsIClockPeriod,levelGoodPulse))
00191     {
00192       hXRayAmplitude->Fill(vCsI_timing[i].GetMax(), kCsITimingChannel+1 );
00193       hXRayTime->Fill(vCsI_timing[i].GetTimeNs(),kCsITimingChannel+1 );
00194     }
00195     else{hXRayStats->Fill(7);hXRayAmplitudeMissed->Fill(vCsI_timing[i].GetMax(), kCsITimingChannel+1 );} 
00196   }
00197  
00198 
00199   for(int i=0; i < vCsI_energy.size(); i++)
00200   {
00201     hXRayStats->Fill(4);
00202     if(vCsI_energy[i].GoodPulse(shapCsIEnergyChannel,energyCsIClockPeriod,levelGoodPulse))
00203     {
00204       hXRayAmplitude->Fill(vCsI_energy[i].GetMax(), kCsIEnergyChannel+1 );
00205      // hXRayAvAmplitude->Fill(nAverage, vCsI_energy[i].GetAverageMax(nAverage), kCsIEnergyChannel+1 );
00206      // if(vCsI_energy[i].FitGauss(10, 10, shapCsIEnergyChannel, energyCsIClockPeriod, pedestalCsIEnergyChannel)) { hXRayFitAmplitude->Fill( vCsI_energy[i].GetMaxGauss(), kCsIEnergyChannel+1 ); }
00207       hXRayTime->Fill(vCsI_energy[i].GetTimeNs(),kCsIEnergyChannel+1 );
00208     }
00209     else {hXRayStats->Fill(8);hXRayAmplitudeMissed->Fill(vCsI_energy[i].GetMax(), kCsIEnergyChannel+1 );}
00210   }
00211  
00212 
00213   gData->fNaIHits.clear();
00214   MakeHits(vNaI_timing, vNaI_energy);
00215   MakeHits(vCsI_timing, vCsI_energy);
00216   PileUpProtectHits();
00217   SortHits();//After PP algorithm!
00218 
00219   return SUCCESS;
00220 
00221 }
00222 
00223 void TNaIAnalysis::MakeHits(vector<TOctalFADCIsland>& vec_timing,vector<TOctalFADCIsland>& vec_energy)
00224 {
00225   vector<TNaIHit>& vHits = gData->fNaIHits;
00226   
00227   //get channel
00228   if(vec_timing.empty() || vec_energy.empty()) return;
00229   int channel = vec_timing[0].GetFADCChannel();
00230   //printf("Making a hits for channel %d and channel %d\n",vec_timing[0].GetFADCChannel(),vec_energy[0].GetFADCChannel());
00231 
00232   //set (channel specific) parameters
00233   double timingClockPeriod, energyClockPeriod;
00234 
00235   if(channel == kNaITimingChannel)
00236   {
00237     timingClockPeriod = timingNaIClockPeriod;
00238     energyClockPeriod = energyNaIClockPeriod;
00239   }
00240   else if(channel == kCsITimingChannel)
00241   {
00242     timingClockPeriod = timingCsIClockPeriod;
00243     energyClockPeriod = energyCsIClockPeriod;
00244   }
00245   else {printf("Invalid parameters to construct NaIHits!!!\n");};
00246 
00247 
00248   int lastEnergyPulse=0; // stays just behind the time of the timing pulse
00249   int count = 0;
00250   int energyHit = -1;
00251 
00252   //make coincidences and construct hits
00253   for(int iTime=0; iTime < vec_timing.size(); iTime++) 
00254   {
00255     if(vec_timing[iTime].GetPulseQuality() == 0)
00256     {
00257       double timingT = vec_timing[iTime].GetCFBlockTime()*timingClockPeriod;
00258       TTimeWindow coincWindow(timingT + tLow, timingT + tHigh);
00259 
00260       for(int iEgy=lastEnergyPulse; iEgy<vec_energy.size(); iEgy++)
00261       {
00262         if(vec_energy[iEgy].GetPulseQuality() == 0)
00263         {
00264           double energyT = vec_energy[iEgy].GetMaxBinBlockTime()*energyClockPeriod;
00265 
00266           if(coincWindow.IsLow(energyT))  { lastEnergyPulse = iEgy; }
00267           else if(coincWindow.Includes(energyT))
00268           {
00269             count++;
00270             energyHit = iEgy;
00271             if(channel == kNaITimingChannel) { hXRayTimingEnergyTDiffVsAmplitude->Fill(energyT-timingT,vec_energy[iEgy].GetMax(),1.); } //printf("NaI tDiff = %f\n",energyT-timingT); }
00272               else { hXRayTimingEnergyTDiffVsAmplitude->Fill(energyT-timingT,vec_energy[iEgy].GetMax(),2.); } //printf("CsI tDiff = %f\n",energyT-timingT);}
00273           }
00274           else if(coincWindow.IsHigh(energyT)) break;
00275         }
00276       }
00277 
00278       //the idea is that only one (slow) E signal lines up with a fast signal, otherwise there is a problem (and the hit is flagged with ncount > 1
00279       if(count>0)
00280       {
00281         if( channel == kNaITimingChannel) { hXRayStats->Fill(9); } else { hXRayStats->Fill(10); }
00282         TNaIHit naihit(vec_timing[iTime],vec_energy[energyHit],count);
00283         vHits.push_back(naihit);
00284       }
00285       count=0;
00286     }
00287   }
00288 
00289 
00290 }
00291 
00292 
00293 void TNaIAnalysis::PileUpProtectHits()
00294 {
00295   vector<TNaIHit>& vHits = gData->fNaIHits;
00296   //printf("Loop through %d Xray hist for PP\n",vHits.size());
00297   if(vHits.size() == 0 || vHits.size() == 1) return;
00298 
00299   //Hits are stacked first for one detector, than for the other, so a single loop is sufficient
00300   for(int i = 1; i < vHits.size()-1; i++)
00301   {
00302     //printf("%d Xray hit : time = %f, energy = %f, detector = %d P\n",i, vHits[i].GetTime(),vHits[i].GetEnergy(),vHits[i].GetDetector() );
00303     //the actual pile up algorithm
00304     if(vHits[i-1].GetEnergyTime()==vHits[i].GetEnergyTime())
00305     {
00306       vHits[i-1].SetPileUp(true);
00307       vHits[i].SetPileUp(true);
00308     }
00309     //Filling histograms
00310     if(vHits[i-1].GetPileUp()) { hXRayStats->Fill(vHits[i-1].GetDetector()+10); }
00311     if(vHits[i-1].GetCount() > 1) {hXRayStats->Fill(vHits[i-1].GetDetector()+12);}
00312   }
00313 
00314     //this "strange second step is to avoid a second for loop over all hits. don`t know if it makes much of a difference though
00315   if(vHits[vHits.size()-1].GetPileUp()){ hXRayStats->Fill(vHits[vHits.size()-1].GetDetector()+10); }
00316   if(vHits[vHits.size()-1].GetCount() > 1){ hXRayStats->Fill(vHits[vHits.size()-1].GetDetector()+12); }
00317 }
00318 
00319 void TNaIAnalysis::SortHits()
00320 {
00321   vector<TNaIHit>& vHits = gData->fNaIHits;
00322   std::sort(vHits.begin(), vHits.end(),TNaIHit::TimeSortNaIHits());
00323 }
